message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $2,000,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I can get from it. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than this.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value. However, the product's intrinsic worth and potential warrant a higher price. I'm willing to come down to $1,750,000.  I believe this reflects a fair compromise.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $1,750,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'm proposing $1,500,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
